mapper.select: SELECT i_user, user_id, user_pw, salt, email FROM t_user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT user_id FROM t_user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT email FROM t_user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT nick FROM t_user WHERE nick = #{nick}

SELECT A.i_point, A.totalPoint, A.totalCash, A.myPoint, A.myCash, A.myPointNow, A.i_point, A.i_user, B.i_user, B.nick, A.r_dt FROM t_myPoint A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
WHERE A.i_user = #{i_user} ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (user_id, user_pw, salt, nm, nick, uNum, email) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{salt}, #{nm}, #{nick}, #{uNum}, #{email})
INSERT INTO t_myPoint (i_user, myPoint, myCash, myPointNow) VALUES (#{i_user}, #{myPoint}, #{myCash}, #{myPointNow})
INSERT INTO t_myPoint (i_user, totalPoint, myPoint, myCash) VALUES (#{i_user}, #{totalPoint}, #{myPoint}, #{myCash})
